titleStmt.title: The humble petition and address of the general court sitting at Boston in New-England, unto the high and mighty Prince Charles the Second. And presented unto his most-gracious majesty Feb. 11. 1660.
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. General Court.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Endecott, John, 1588?-1665.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from Evans.
